1.text: Bring 1 cup (240 ml) of water to boil.

2.text: Put 1/4 cup (22 g) of oats in a food processor and grind them to a powder.
2.vid: /d/d2/Prepare Oatmeal Cereal for a Baby Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Stir the ground oats into the boiling water.
3.vid: /a/af/Prepare Oatmeal Cereal for a Baby Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Turn the burner to medium and simmer the cereal for 10 minutes.
4.vid: /3/32/Prepare Oatmeal Cereal for a Baby Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Cool the oatmeal cereal to room temperature.

6.text: Mix in 1 teaspoon (5 g) of pureed fruit or vegetable if you want to flavor the cereal.
6.vid: /4/40/Prepare Oatmeal Cereal for a Baby Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Stir in 3 to 5 US tbsp (44 to 74 ml) of liquid if you want to thin the cereal.
7.vid: /7/7d/Prepare Oatmeal Cereal for a Baby Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Put 1 tablespoon (2.5 g) of oatmeal cereal into a bowl.

9.text: Pour in 4 tablespoons (59 ml) of breastmilk or formula.
9.vid: /e/e6/Prepare Oatmeal Cereal for a Baby Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Stir the oatmeal cereal until it's smooth and thin.

11.text: Feed the oatmeal cereal to your baby.
